awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 22 nominations.

fullplot: The unluckiest man in Vegas - a guy whose bad luck is contagious - is used by the last of the old time mob run casinos to kill high rollers' action. That is, until he falls in love with a cocktail waitress and gets "lady luck," which throws the situation into reverse. Things turn nasty when the casino director tries to break up the romance.
plot: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.
title: The Cooler

tomatoes.consensus: A small movie elevated by superb performances.
